1573520.name: Flow Gear Racing Demo
1573520.description:
Flow Gear Racing is a fast immersive Single- and Multiplayer Space Racing Game designed for Virtual Reality. The best space pilots come together to compete on the most demanding and sophisticated racetracks in the galaxy. Challenge your friends, race against the computer and watch your progress on the global leaderboards. Enter your cockpit, fasten your seat-belts and become part of the Virtual Reality Space Pilot community!

Try out the Demo version and race against the AI opponents and a ghost racer representing your best track time.
